Substraction.sub module

class Substraction.sub.SimpleCalculator[source]

Bases: object

A simple calculator class to perform basic arithmetic operations.

Methods:

add(a, b)

Returns the sum of two numbers a and b.

mul(a, b)[source]

Add two numbers.

Parameters: a (float): First number. b (float): Second number.

Returns: float: The sum of a and b.
